actions.name: CreateConnectorProfile
actions.description: Grants permission to create a login profile to be used with Amazon AppFlow flows

actions.name: CreateFlow
actions.description: Grants permission to create an Amazon AppFlow flow

actions.name: DeleteConnectorProfile
actions.description: Grants permission to delete a login profile configured in Amazon AppFlow

actions.name: DeleteFlow
actions.description: Grants permission to delete an Amazon AppFlow flow

actions.name: DescribeConnectorEntity
actions.description: Grants permission to describe all fields for an object in a login profile configured in Amazon AppFlow

actions.name: DescribeConnectorFields
actions.description: Grants permission to describe all fields for an object in a login profile configured in Amazon AppFlow (Console Only)

actions.name: DescribeConnectorProfiles
actions.description: Grants permission to describe all login profiles configured in Amazon AppFlow

actions.name: DescribeConnectors
actions.description: Grants permission to describe all connectors supported by Amazon AppFlow

actions.name: DescribeFlow
actions.description: Grants permission to describe a specific flow configured in Amazon AppFlow

actions.name: DescribeFlowExecution
actions.description: Grants permission to describe all flow executions for a flow configured in Amazon AppFlow (Console Only)

actions.name: DescribeFlowExecutionRecords
actions.description: Grants permission to describe all flow executions for a flow configured in Amazon AppFlow

actions.name: DescribeFlows
actions.description: Grants permission to describe all flows configured in Amazon AppFlow (Console Only)

actions.name: ListConnectorEntities
actions.description: Grants permission to list all objects for a login profile configured in Amazon AppFlow

actions.name: ListConnectorFields
actions.description: Grants permission to list all objects for a login profile configured in Amazon AppFlow (Console Only)

actions.name: ListFlows
actions.description: Grants permission to list all flows configured in Amazon AppFlow

actions.name: ListTagsForResource
actions.description: Grants permission to list tags for a flow

actions.name: RunFlow
actions.description: Grants permission to run a flow configured in Amazon AppFlow (Console Only)

actions.name: StartFlow
actions.description: Grants permission to activate (for scheduled and event-triggered flows) or run (for on-demand flows) a flow configured in Amazon AppFlow

actions.name: StopFlow
actions.description: Grants permission to deactivate a scheduled or event-triggered flow configured in Amazon AppFlow

actions.name: TagResource
actions.description: Grants permission to tag a flow

actions.name: UntagResource
actions.description: Grants permission to untag a flow

actions.name: UpdateConnectorProfile
actions.description: Grants permission to update a login profile configured in Amazon AppFlow

actions.name: UpdateFlow
actions.description: Grants permission to update a flow configured in Amazon AppFlow

actions.name: UseConnectorProfile
actions.description: Grants permission to use a connector profile while creating a flow in Amazon AppFlow
